theme: A cozy woolen cottage with a classic, sloped roof, balancing soft textures with sturdy, grounding elements.

modules.name: Hearthstone Living Room
modules.walls: dark_oak_log frame with white_wool and light_gray_wool panels

furniture_and_fixtures.fireplace: A central fireplace made of cobblestone, cobblestone_stairs, cobblestone_wall, dark_oak_log, dark_oak_stairs, and dark_oak_slab with a lit campfire
furniture_and_fixtures.decoration: white_wool accents, light_gray_carpet, and a flower_pot with a potted_fern

modules.name: Rustic Cottage Kitchen
modules.walls: dark_oak_log frame with white_wool and light_gray_wool panels

furniture_and_fixtures.countertops: spruce_planks, spruce_trapdoor, and spruce_slab with dark_oak_stairs and a tripwire_hook as a faucet
furniture_and_fixtures.storage: barrels and a dark_oak_fence for hanging items
